content:
Both Petco and PetSmart typically carry Nature's Miracle cleaning solutions, including the one you need for Max's bowls. They usually have a wide selection of pet cleaning supplies, including Nature's Miracle products.

You can check their websites or visit their stores in person to confirm availability. They might even have other pet-safe cleaning solutions from various brands, so you can compare prices and products.

If you're unable to find the specific Nature's Miracle product you need, you can always ask a store associate for assistance. They might be able to special order it for you or recommend a similar product.

Remember to read the labels and check the ingredients to ensure you're getting a pet-safe cleaning solution for Max's bowls.

Good luck, and I hope you find what you need!
